Class MainViewController

java.lang.Object
com.EnderLite.GUI.MainView.MainViewController
public class MainViewController extends Object
Class for JavaFX to controll main view in client

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes everything to default

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(String message, String login, String time, boolean user)
      Used to print message in client
      Parameters:
      message - text to send
      login - user nickname
      time - time of sending
      user - indicates if user of given client send message (true) or other (false)

    • clearChat

      public void clearChat()
      used to clear chats while changing chats

    • notification

      public void notification(String text, boolean hideAfterTime)
      Popups notification and hides after 1 second
      Parameters:
      text - message to appear
      hideAfterTime - if true notification will hide after 1 second otherwise it will stay forever

    • addNotification

      public void addNotification(String login)
      Used to send friend request accept or deny notification. Waits until user select to accept or deny.
      Parameters:
      login - user name that invites

    • emergencyExit

      public void emergencyExit()
      Exits everything with emergency notification
